title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Ryan Leaf about a variety of NFL topics, including what he sees for Baker Mayfield's future. Alan Shipnuck, author of the Phil Mickelson book, explains why he was removed from Mickelson's LIV Golf press conference. Plus, Adam Sandler discusses his new movie "Hustle," available now on Netflix.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
